articles.description:
This chart says u want to buy here UNLESS something absolutely crazy happens like Binance going under…
What do the lads think

CryptoCon: #Bitcoin seller exhaustion has absolutely plummeted!
The lowest reading since Nov 2018 before one of the largest moves in history
The 2 ingredients for seller exhaustion:
1. Low Volatility
2. High Losses
Volatility has been squeezed to a minimum, and this is a Bull Market...

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
My man FKA Based Potato has it right me thinks.
Everything flows from the 🌽. All hail the king.

0xpotato: @DeFiSurfer808 my perspective as w all comments re stables / onchain activity is that value flows in 1 direction
BTC/ETH pump ---> Onchain activity rises --> Leverage/OI rises ---> Stablecoin minting volume rises
thats how it works it doesnt flow the other way. Its an effect not a cause.
